'''Into the Painting...''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to collect all 6 [[Broken, Graffiti-Marked Stone]], then repair the mural and access [[Manse of Monetoo Murals]], [[Teticpac Peak]], [[Natlan]].
